TypeSignature.Value: .class public auto ansi sealed ActivityInstanceState extends System.Enum

Docs.summary: Describes the state of an activity instance.

MemberSignature.Value: .field public static literal valuetype System.Activities.ActivityInstanceState Canceled = int32(2)

Docs.summary: Specifies that the activity is in a canceled state.

remarks.format: ## Remarks F:System.Activities.ActivityInstanceState.Canceled?qualifyHint=False&autoUpgrade=True is a terminal state for an activity instance. A F:System.Activities.ActivityInstanceState.Canceled?qualifyHint=False&autoUpgrade=True activity completed without performing the function it was designed to perform.

MemberSignature.Value: .field public static literal valuetype System.Activities.ActivityInstanceState Closed = int32(1)

Docs.summary: Specifies that the activity is in a closed state.

remarks.format: ## Remarks F:System.Activities.ActivityInstanceState.Closed?qualifyHint=False&autoUpgrade=True is a terminal state for an activity instance. A F:System.Activities.ActivityInstanceState.Closed?qualifyHint=False&autoUpgrade=True activity completed successfully and performed the function it was designed to perform.

MemberSignature.Value: .field public static literal valuetype System.Activities.ActivityInstanceState Executing = int32(0)

Docs.summary: Specifies that the activity is in an executing state.

MemberSignature.Value: .field public static literal valuetype System.Activities.ActivityInstanceState Faulted = int32(3)

Docs.summary: Specifies that the activity is in a faulted state.

remarks.format: ## Remarks F:System.Activities.ActivityInstanceState.Faulted?qualifyHint=False&autoUpgrade=True is a terminal state for an activity instance. A F:System.Activities.ActivityInstanceState.Faulted?qualifyHint=False&autoUpgrade=True activity instance was aborted during execution, potentially because of an exception, and did not perform the function it was designed to perform.
